sentence: In Pennsylvanias primary election next month, Marsicano is running against Jim Bognet, who worked in President Donald Trumps administration to help create manufacturing jobs to rebuild Americas industrial heartland.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Former Democrat Running in PA Republican Primary for U.S. House Seat Against Former Trump Official

sentence: In a statement from his Save America PAC, Trump gave Bognet, who previously worked in his administration creating manufacturing jobs to rebuild Americas industrial heartland, his Complete and Total Endorsement!? Jim Bognet will be a fantastic Congressman for Pennsylvanias 8th Congressional District!
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Donald Trump Endorses Pennsylvania Republican Jim Bognet for Congress
